summary: Core utility module providing standardized URI manipulation and a comprehensive hierarchy of domain-specific exceptions. It ensures consistent handling of local and remote data paths while providing actionable remediation hints for common data access failures.
responsibilities: Normalize and resolve URIs across local, S3, and B2 storage backends.
Provide a unified exception base class with user-facing remediation instructions.
Detect and categorize storage misconfigurations (e.g., B2 vs AWS endpoint mismatches).
Enforce safety thresholds for in-memory data loading via LargeDataError.
Handle path joining and scheme parsing for portable dataset manifests.
